name: Frimstone Ltd
goal: Independent quarry, recycling and waste business that needs to make profit but has a very responsible outlook on being a good neighbour with a need to ensure our activities are in balance with all our stakeholders. We have a contract with Norfolk County Council to handle and process export their residual waste to RDF and export under TFS for reuse in Dutch & German EfW plants as a fuel.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Transport
euInitiatives: Waste, Working Time, Employment Law, Environmental Legislation, Tax, Heath & Safety Legislation
